properties.title: Chamanna Jenatsch CAS
properties.description: Jenatsch hut is grisons’ highest SAC hut. In summer a stopover on the «Bernina Trek», in winter on the «Haute Route Graubünden». Mountain lovers, climbers, mountain bikers, ski mountaineers, snowboarders and snowshoe hikers appreciate the silence and the solitude in the rearmost area of Val Bever, between Julier and Albula Pass. There are special features such as a sauna and double bedrooms.
